data.message: My all time favorite Hip-Hop/Rap artist, hands down better than anyone alive or dead... Some of you may hate me for saying that, but no other lyricist has kept me from killing myself, when I was younger I could relate to Eminem. I knew what it was like to grow up with out a farther, to see my mom strung out on drugs, to act like an idiot because no one would stop me. But at the end of the day, when I was all alone, I would just sit back and listen to Eminem and I didn't feel like I was the only one who had a shitty upbringing. I'm at least glad he could make something for himself, give people like me hope for the future, and understanding that shit happens, so for that I thank him.

replies.message: Don't see how's he is not considered in that top list
People saying guys with less lyrical talent are better
You're Stan, yeah mate Christopher Anthony Colon-White ? 😂👏 Pretty darn impressive tho.
I've never written a single letter to Eminem, nor am I in love with him.

If you're here to start drama, please go elsewhere. I don't have time for people on the internet starting shit cus their real lives are so pathetic they talk crap online because it's the only attention they can get...

Anyone who talks shit when someone says Eminem helped them through they're whole childhood is a fucking idiot who doesn't know what they're talking about and your just adding to the help. Tk Reihana I'm just going to guess the worst thing you've ever been through was a C- in highschool. Faggot

Eminem is who inspired me first to write poetry instead of letting shit build up inside of me to the point where I'd fucking snap. If you are so blind and can't see that as a good thing, then that tells me you have issue that you need to work out. I'm sorry I figured it out before you, don't worry keep trying you'll get there if you don't give up.

I'm a grown ass man,
I walk my own path.
With my heart in my hands,
And a knife in my back.             

Every step I take,
I'm consumed by wrath. 
Try to live this life humble,
But haunted by my past.                                                           
Taunted in my dreams,
Of the love I had. 
Of the love I've lost,
That I'll never get back.

So don't tell me I don't,   
A God damn thing about this life.
When you don't know shit about my pain,
Shit about my struggle, or shit about my strife...

'Cause I'm Slim Shady, yes I'm the real Shady
All you other Slim Shadys are just imitating
So won't the real Slim Shady please stand up,
Please stand up, please stand up?
